con:testCase.name: REJECT
con:testCase.con:description:
This testcase displays the flow for REJECT action. Here a payment is created and then PEN REJECT action is performed on the payment.
Expected Flow: Payment Create (Future Value Date) -> RFDD -> REJECT Action -> REJECTED.

con:request.name: Auth
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentauthorization:v1_2" xmlns:urn1="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:paymentauthorization:v1_2" xmlns:urn2="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:authorization:v1_2" xmlns:urn3="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:authorization:v1_1"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PAYS</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${DataSource#DebCustomerID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>NBA</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${DataSource#OrgID}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${DataSource#OrgID}</wsc:orgunit><wsc:customerid>${DataSource#DebCustomerID}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="${Properties#item2}" value="${DataSource#DebCustomerID}"/> <wsc:item key="${Properties#item1}" value="${Properties#value1}"/> <wsc:item key="${Properties#item3}" value="${Properties#value3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> <urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> <urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> <urn2:agreementData> <urn3:agreementId>${DataSource#DebCustomerID}</urn3:agreementId> <urn3:bankId>${DataSource#OrgID}</urn3:bankId> <urn3:customerID>${DataSource#DebCustomerID}</urn3:customerID> <urn3:productID>${DataSource#DebCustomerID}</urn3:productID> </urn2:agreementData> <urn2:userId>${DataSource#DebCustomerID}</urn2:userId> <urn2:sessionID>12106704005</urn2:sessionID> <urn2:firstName>Test</urn2:firstName> <urn2:lastName>Cust</urn2:lastName> <urn2:userAccount> <urn2:accountNumber>${DataSource#DebAccountID}</urn2:accountNumber> <urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier>12106704005</urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier> <urn2:currencyCode>NOK</urn2:currencyCode> <urn2:accountType>CoreAccount</urn2:accountType> <urn2:role>View</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Register</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Appprove</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Salary</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Transfer</urn2:role> <urn2:approvalLimit>999999</urn2:approvalLimit> <urn2:registerLimit>999999</urn2:registerLimit> <urn2:numberOfVerifiers>0</urn2:numberOfVerifiers> <urn2:numberOfApprovers>1</urn2:numberOfApprovers> </urn2:userAccount> </urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> </urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> </urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: PaymentCreate
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v1_10" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v1_10" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v8" xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v1_8" xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v1_8"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PAYS</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${DataSource#DebCustomerID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>NBA</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${DataSource#OrgID}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${DataSource#OrgID}</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>${DataSource#DebCustomerID}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="${Properties#item2}" value="${DataSource#DebCustomerID}"/> <wsc:item key="${Properties#item1}" value="${Properties#value1}"/> <wsc:item key="${Properties#item3}" value="${Properties#value3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentCreateRequest> <urn:paymentMessage> <urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn2:messageIdentification>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:messageIdentification> <urn2:endToEndIdentification>332</urn2:endToEndIdentification> </urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn1:paymentInfo> <urn3:paymentMethod>TRF</urn3:paymentMethod> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn3:paymentTypeInformation> <urn3:instructionPriority>NORM</urn3:instructionPriority> </urn3:paymentTypeInformation>
<urn3:requestedExecutionDate>${Properties#futureExnDate}</urn3:requestedExecutionDate><urn3:debtorAccount> <urn2:identification>${DataSource#DebAccountID}</urn2:identification> <urn2:currency>${Properties#DebitAcntccy}</urn2:currency> </urn3:debtorAccount> <urn3:debtorAgentBIC>${DataSource#DebitorAgent}</urn3:debtorAgentBIC> </urn1:paymentInfo> <urn1:transaction> <urn4:amount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="${DataSource#Instructedccy}"> <urn2:amount>${DataSource#InstructedAmt}</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount> </urn4:amount> <urn4:chargeBearer>${DataSource#chargeBearer}</urn4:chargeBearer> <urn4:creditorAgent> <urn2:bic>${DataSource#CreditorAgent}</urn2:bic> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:country>${DataSource#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn4:creditorAgent> <urn4:creditor> <urn2:name>${DataSource#CreditorName}</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:department>asd</urn2:department> <urn2:subDepartment>sd</urn2:subDepartment> <urn2:streetName>sd</urn2:streetName> <urn2:buildingNumber>32</urn2:buildingNumber> <urn2:postCode>323</urn2:postCode> <urn2:townName>sd</urn2:townName> <urn2:country>${DataSource#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn4:creditor> <urn4:creditorAccount> <urn2:identification>${DataSource#Creditor_Account}</urn2:identification> <urn2:currency>${DataSource#CreditorCcy}</urn2:currency> </urn4:creditorAccount> <urn1:remittanceInformationUnstructured>${DataSource#FreeText}</urn1:remittanceInformationUnstructured> </urn1:transaction> </urn:paymentMessage> </urn:PaymentCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Confirm
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v1_1" xmlns:urn1="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:payment-status-update:v1_1"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PAYS</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${DataSource#DebCustomerID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>NBA</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${DataSource#OrgID}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${DataSource#OrgID}</wsc:orgunit><wsc:customerid>${DataSource_old#CustomerID}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="${Properties#item2}" value="${DataSource#DebCustomerID}"/> <wsc:item key="${Properties#item1}" value="${Properties#value1}"/> <wsc:item key="${Properties#item3}" value="${Properties#value3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentConfirmRequest> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 4 items at this level--> <urn:transactionInput> <!--1 or more repetitions:-->
<urn1:transactionId>${PaymentCreate#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v1_10'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v1_10'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}</urn1:transactionId></urn:transactionInput> </urn:PaymentConfirmRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Approve

con:config.con:query: SELECT BUSINESSKEY, LOG_ID,BANK_ORG_ID, FK_EVENT_TYPE_ID, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, EVENT_TYPE.SUBCATEGORY FROM EVENT_LOG INNER JOIN EVENT_TYPE ON EVENT_LOG.FK_EVENT_TYPE_ID = EVENT_TYPE.EVENT_TYPE_ID WHERE BUSINESSKEY = '${PaymentRead#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v1_10'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v1_10'; //ns2:PaymentReadResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:result[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}'
